Jekyll theme

I've created from ground-up a Jekyll theme for API documentation. It is almost an exact copy of the beautifully designed API of unsplash.
Most of the content is written in markdown, so it is very easily to set up. The documention is presented in a single page with a fixed navigation bar on the left. I personally love it and use it for the server of Benevolas but I can't prove it by releasing a link to the documentation until it is ready.

A small demo is available.
